language-parser.code-example:
DATA: TEXT1(30) VALUE 'This is the first text', TEXT2(30) VALUE 'This is the second text', TEXT3(30) VALUE 'This is the third text', STRING(5) VALUE 'eco'.
IF TEXT1 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 1 is fulfilled'. ELSEIF TEXT2 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 2 is fulfilled'. ELSEIF TEXT3 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 3 is fulfilled'. ELSE. WRITE / 'No condition is fulfilled'. ENDIF.
DATA: TEXTO1(30) VALUE 'This is the first TEXTO', TEXTO2(30) VALUE 'This is the second TEXTO', TEXTO3(30) VALUE 'This is the third TEXTO', STRING(5) VALUE 'eco'.
IF TEXTO1 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 1'. ELSEIF TEXTO2 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 2'. ELSEIF TEXTO3 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 3'. ELSE. WRITE / 'No condition is fulfilled'. ENDIF.
DATA: TEXTOS1(30) VALUE 'This is the first TEXTOS', TEXTOS2(30) VALUE 'This is the second TEXTOS', TEXTOS3(30) VALUE 'This is the third TEXTOS', STRING(5) VALUE 'eco'.
IF TEXTOS1 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 1'. ELSEIF TEXTOS2 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 2'. ENDIF.
IF TEXTOS1 CS STRING. WRITE / 'Condition 1'. ENDIF.

" ' mwConErr = true 'else ' centroCon = trim(ObjMw.GetOutputValue("CentroContable")) 'end if 'set ObjMw = nothing %>

Consulta de pendientes
 
  Este procedimiento le permite consultar...
 
 
Ordenado por:

# ------------------------------------------------------------------ # @1 # ------------------------------------------------------------------
DATABASE dummy
define wtime datetime year to second
MAIN
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "Start - : ",wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
LET ls_sql =" Select numinvoice from invoices " PREPARE psel_invoices FROM ls_sql DECLARE qsel_concprefact cursor with hold for psel_invoices
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "End - ", wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
END MAIN

0340 DEFINE DATA 0350 * 0360 PARAMETER 0370 1 M-CODPR (N2) 0380 1 M-INVENTA (P7) 0390 1 W-DESCRIPCION (A26) 0400 1 W-MENSAJE (A22) 0410 1 W-CONT1 (N7) 0420 1 FIN (L) 0430 1 W-MOVIMIENTO (A1) 0440 LOCAL 0450 1 M-MENSAJE (A25) 0460 1 W-INVENTARIO (A10) 0470 1 REDEFINE W-INVENTARIO 0480 2 W-PR (N2) 0490 2 W-P (A1) 0500 2 W-I (N7) (EM=9999999) 0510 END-DEFINE 0520 *
0560 *
0590 * 0600 FORMAT(1) LS=132 PS=60 0610 * 0620 DECIDE ON FIRST VALUE OF W-MOVIMIENTO 0630 VALUE 'A' 0640 MOVE 'ALTAS REALIZADAS' TO M-MENSAJE 0650 VALUE 'B' 0660 MOVE 'BAJAS REALIZADAS' TO M-MENSAJE 0670 VALUE 'M' 0680 MOVE 'MODIFICACIONES REALIZADAS' TO M-MENSAJE 0690 VALUE 'E' 0700 MOVE 'ELIMINACIONES REALIZADAS' TO M-MENSAJE 0710 VALUE 'R' 0720 MOVE 'REASIGNACIONES REALIZADAS' TO M-MENSAJE 0730 NONE VALUE IGNORE 0740 END-DECIDE 0750 * 0760 AT TOP OF PAGE (1) 0770 WRITE(1) NOTITLE NOHDR USING MAP 'IC11119M' 0780 END-TOPPAGE 0790 * 0800 IF M-CODPR NE 0 0810 MOVE M-CODPR TO W-PR 0820 MOVE '.' TO W-P 0830 MOVE M-INVENTA TO W-I 0840 WRITE(1) NOTITLE NOHDR 3X W-INVENTARIO 9X W-DESCRIPCION 7X W-MENSAJE 0850 END-IF 0860 * 0880 * 0890 IF FIN EQ TRUE 0900 SKIP(1) 3 LINES 0910 WRITE(1) 'Nº TOTAL DE ' M-MENSAJE ':...' W-CONT1 0920 END-IF 0930 * 0940 END

<?xml version = '1.0' encoding = 'UTF-8'?> <Module version="101020002" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/Forms"> <FormModule> <ProgramUnit Name="CARGAR_LISTAS" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="PROCEDURE CARGAR_LISTAS IS&#10;BEGIN&#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10; --:BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := null; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10;END;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="ACTIVAR_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure ACTIVAR_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; SiNo In Boolean ) Is&#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'TRUE' And Not SiNo Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_False);&#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'FALSE' And SiNo Then &#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_True);&#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="BACKGROUND_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure BACKGROUND_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; Color In Varchar2 ) Is&#10; /* r225g225b225 Gray12 &#10; r255g255b255 White */ &#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r225g225b225' And Color = 'r255g255b255' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_WHITE'); &#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r255g255b255' And Color = 'r225g225b225' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_GRAY12'); &#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> </FormModule> </Module>

Globalstyles

Requires HTML5 doctype

Metro UI CSS makes use of certain HTML elements and CSS properties that require the use of the HTML5 doctype. Include it at the beginning of all your projects.

    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html lang="en">
      ...
    </html>

JavaScript

All javascript plugins required jQuery.

Reset Styles

In Metro UI CSS used normalize.css by Nicolas Gallaher

Colors

  • *-color-green
  • *-color-greenDark
  • *-color-greenLight
  • *-color-pink
  • *-color-pinkDark

 

  • *-color-yellow
  • *-color-darken
  • *-color-purple
  • *-color-blue
  • *-color-blueDark

 

  • *-color-blueLight
  • *-color-orange
  • *-color-orangeDark
  • *-color-red
  • *-color-white

To set background color use prefix bg, for set text color use prefix fg

    <div class="bg-color-red">...</div>
    <span class="fg-color-blue">...</span>

To set border color use prefix border

 
 
 
 
  
    <div class="border-color-red">...</div>

To set outline color for components (such as tile, listView item, etc.) use prefix outline

 
 
 
  
    <div class="tile outline-color-red">...</div>

Fonts

In Metro UI CSS i use Segoe UI, Open Sans fonts (depending on the availability in the system).

DECLARE CURSOR-EDA CURSOR FOR SELECT COD_CSGAT, COD_CLASGAT, COD_IDIOMA, DES_REGISTRO, DES_REGEDA, AUD_FMODIFIC, AUD_USUARIO FROM TAEGTEDA --WHERE COD_CSGAT = 152 WHERE COD_IDIOMA = 1 ORDER BY COD_CSGAT, COD_CLASGAT, COD_IDIOMA; WHENEVER SQLERROR GO TO AEGTU100-ERROR; OPEN CURSOR-EDA; FETCH CURSOR-EDA INTO :EDA-COD-CSGAT , :EDA-COD-CLASGAT , :EDA-COD-IDIOMA , :EDA-DES-REGISTRO , :EDA-DES-REGEDA , :EDA-AUD-FMODIFIC , :EDA-AUD-USUARIO; CLOSE CURSOR-EDA;

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[Get_Data_CC_Llamadas_Busqueda]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) drop procedure [dbo].[Get_Data_CC_Llamadas_Busqueda] GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Get_Data_CC_Llamadas_Busqueda] ( @Prospecto varchar(250), @Telefono varchar(11), @StatusId Int )
AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
IF @StatusId <> 0 BEGIN Select CL.CampañaId, CL.LlamadaConsecutivoId, CC.Tipo, CL.Prospecto, CL.Telefono, CS.StatusDl from CC_Llamadas CL Join CC_LlamadasStatus CLS On CL.CampañaId = CLS.CampañaId And CL.LlamadaConsecutivoId = CLS.LlamadaConsecutivoId Join Status CS On CS.StatusId = CLS.StatusId Join CC_Campaña CC On CC.CampañaId = CL.CampañaId Where CL.Prospecto Like '%' + @Prospecto + '%' And CL.Telefono Like '%' + @Telefono + '%' And CLS.StatusLlamadaConsecutivoId = (Select Max(StatusLlamadaConsecutivoId) From CC_LlamadasStatus Where CampañaId = CLS.CampañaId And LlamadaConsecutivoId = CLS.LlamadaConsecutivoId) And CLS.StatusId = @StatusId END ELSE BEGIN Select CL.CampañaId, CL.LlamadaConsecutivoId, CC.Tipo, CL.Prospecto, CL.Telefono, CS.StatusDl from CC_Llamadas CL Join CC_LlamadasStatus CLS On CL.CampañaId = CLS.CampañaId And CL.LlamadaConsecutivoId = CLS.LlamadaConsecutivoId Join Status CS On CS.StatusId = CLS.StatusId Join CC_Campaña CC On CC.CampañaId = CL.CampañaId Where CL.Prospecto Like '%' + @Prospecto + '%' And CL.Telefono Like '%' + @Telefono + '%' And CLS.StatusLlamadaConsecutivoId = (Select Max(StatusLlamadaConsecutivoId) From CC_LlamadasStatus Where CampañaId = CLS.CampañaId And LlamadaConsecutivoId = CLS.LlamadaConsecutivoId) END
END
GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO

Private Sub CmdLimpiar_Click() On Error GoTo CmdLimpiarClick_Error
vLimpiarPantalla
Exit Sub
CmdLimpiarClick_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Resume
End Sub
Sub vLimpiarPantalla()
On Error GoTo LimpiarPantalla_Error
vLimpiarFr1General Fr1Informe, sFlagsInforme
Exit Sub
LimpiarPantalla_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Continue
End Sub
Private Sub Fr1Informe_KeyPress(KeyAscii As Integer) On Error GoTo Fr1Informe_KeyPress_Error
Call inpvMayusculasKeypress(KeyAscii)
Exit Sub Fr1Informe_KeyPress_Error: Call errvManejaErrores(Err) Resume
End Sub

Imports System.xml Imports blackvv.Aps.Ars.Plataforma.Soporte.XML Imports blackvv.Aps.Ars.Plataforma.Soporte.ArsSp Imports blackvv.Aps.Ars.Plataforma.MVC Imports blackvv.Aps.Ars.Plataforma.Soporte.Auditoria Imports blackvv.Aps.Ars.Plataforma.Soporte.Mail
Public Class servicioBJS Inherits ControladorAbstractoBJS
Protected Overridable Sub validarEntrada()
End Sub
#Region "Validaciones de tipos"
Private Sub ValidarCampoCadena(ByVal nombre As String, ByVal valor As String) If Trim(valor).Length = 0 Then Return End If
Try CStr(valor).ToString() Return Catch Throw New Exception("El valor " & valor & " de """ & nombre & """ no es de tipo cadena") End Try End Sub
Private Sub ValidarCampoNumero(ByVal nombre As String, ByVal valor As String) If Trim(valor).Length = 0 Then Return End If
Try Integer.Parse(valor) Return Catch Throw New Exception("El valor " & valor & " de """ & nombre & """ no es de tipo numérico") End Try End Sub #End Region
End Class

i18n.name: Puntos de función por 'backfiring'
i18n.description:
Esta técnica, denominada "backfiring", consiste en un conjunto de ecuaciones bidireccionales para convertir puntos de función en LOC y viceversa. Esto es útil cuando se usan datos de tamaño para una combinación de varios proyectos, algunos con métricas LOC y otros con puntos de función. Sin embargo, generalizar la técnica de "backfiring" para conseguir una mera proporción entre LOC y puntos de función no es aconsejable.
El algoritmo implementado calcula el número de líneas de código del fichero (aplicando la métrica LOC de la tecnología correspondiente) y lo divide entre el valor del parámetro "gearingFactor" que es el factor de cambio para cada tecnología (http://www.qsm.com/?q=resources/function-point-languages-table/index.html).

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description: Cálculo de los puntos de función por BackFiring para ficheros Abap, configurado por parámetro.
Cálculo de los puntos de función por BackFiring para ficheros Asp, configurado por parámetro.
Cálculo de los puntos de función por BackFiring para ficheros ASPNet, configurado por parámetro.

i18n.name: Function points by backfiring
i18n.description:
This technique, called "backfiring", consists of a set of bidirectional equations for converting between function points and LOC. This is reportedly useful when using sizing data from a combination of projects, some with metrics in LOC and some in function points. However, generalizing the Backfiring technique to yield a simple LOC-per-function point ratio is not advisable.
The implemented algorithm calculates the number of lines of code in the file (by applying the LOC metric of the proper technology), and divides it by the value of the parameter "gearingFactor" that represents the gearing factor of each technology (http://www.qsm.com/?q=resources/function-point-languages-table/index.html).

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description: Function points by BackFiring of Abap files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of ASP files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of ASPNet files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of Cobol files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of C files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of C++ files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of C# files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of HTML files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of Informix files, configured by parameters.

Function points by BackFiring of Java files, configured by parameters.
NOTE: When execute this metric over JSP code, counts code lines contained in the definition of scriptlets <% ... %>, declarations <%! ... %> and import directives <%@ page import=... %>
Function points by BackFiring of JavaScript files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of Jcl files, configured by parameters.

Function points by BackFiring of JSP files, configured by parameters.
NOTE: The metric ignores lines contained on scriptlets <% ... %>, declarations <%! ... %> and import directives <%@ page import=...%> Those lines are counted with the proper metric of the JAVA technology applied over the JSP files.
Function points by BackFiring of Natural files, configured by parameters.
Function points by BackFiring of Objective C files, configured by parameters (using NCSS metric for Objective C code as line count).
Function points by BackFiring of XML files created from Oracle Forms. It just measure PlSql embedded code, and it uses the parameter configured for PlSql.
Function points by BackFiring of PHP files, configured by parameters (using NCSS metric for PHP code as line count).
Function points by BackFiring of PlSql files, configured by parameters.
